title: LeBron James, Dak Prescott, Jason Garrett, & Jerry Jones
itunes:title: LeBron James, Dak Prescott, Jason Garrett, & Jerry Jones
description:
Colin discusses why LeBron James doesn't owe the Los Angeles Lakers anything, the current struggles of Dallas Cowboys QB Dak Prescott, why HC Jason Garrett shouldn't be on the hot seat, and Jerry Jones' latest comments on the NFL QB tackle rule. Guests include Joe Buck, James Jones, Joel Klatt, and Eric Decker.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
